Package org.nlpub.watset.eval

Class Pairwise<V>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.nlpub.watset.eval.Pairwise<V>
  • Type Parameters:
    V - a cluster element type.
    public class Pairwise<V>
extends java.lang.Object
    An implementation of a pairwise precision, recall, and F-score.
    See Also:
    Manandhar et al. (SemEval 2010), Ustalov et al. (ACL 2017)
